Class Question

java.lang.Object
application.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a question in a QandA application. This class handles the storage and manipulation of question data, including the question body, author, votes, and associated answers.

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(String body, String askedBy)
      Constructs a new Question with the given body and author. Initializes votes to zero and creates an empty answers list.
      Parameters:
      body - The text content of the question
      askedBy - Username of the person asking the question

    • addAnswer

      public void addAnswer(Answer answer)
      Adds a new answer to this question.
      Parameters:
      answer - The answer to add

    • sortAnswers

      public void sortAnswers()
      Sorts the answers associated with this question. Answers are sorted first by correctness (correct answers first), then by score (upvotes minus downvotes, in descending order).
